Question: Shenzhen Kingwear Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Kingwear Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd

Smart Wearable Device at CES 2024

- Smart wearable devices powered by generative AI and IoT
- Focus on practical, fashionable, and technological designs
- Capable of producing 5,000,000 pcs smart watches annually
